summary: The life of a Russian physician and poet who, although married to another, falls in love with a political activist's wife and experiences hardship during World War I and then the October Revolution.
cast: Omar Sharif|Julie Christie|Geraldine Chaplin|Rod Steiger|Alec Guinness|Tom Courtenay|Siobhan McKenna|Ralph Richardson|Rita Tushingham|Jeffrey Rockland|Tarek Sharif|Bernard Kay|Klaus Kinski|Gérard Tichy|Noel Willman|Geoffrey Keen|Adrienne Corri|Jack MacGowran|Mark Eden|Erik Chitty|Roger Maxwell|Wolf Frees|Gwen Nelson|Lucy Westmore|Lili Muráti|Peter Madden|Luana Alcañiz|David Areu|Assad Bahador|Agustín Bescos|José María Caffarel|Emilio Carrer|Pamella Carrington-Coutte|Catherine Ellison|Pilar Gómez Ferrer|Víctor Israel|Inigo Jackson|Gerhard Jersch|Jari Jolkkonen|Leo Lähteenmäki|Álvaro Marenco|María Martín|José Nieto|Ricardo Palacios|Ingrid Pitt|Robert Rietty|Robert Royal|Mercedes Ruiz|Aldo Sambrell|Virgilio Teixeira|Brigitte Trace|María Vico
title: Doctor Zhivago
